variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-apeye-core
dependencies.description: Core (offline) functionality for the apeye library.

dependencies.name: py-dom-toml
dependencies.description: Dom's tools for Tom's Obvious, Minimal Language.

dependencies.name: py-natsort
dependencies.description: Simple yet flexible natural sorting in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-whey
dependent_to.description: A simple Python wheel builder for simple projects.
